description:
Ohio Attorneys Dedicated To Your Needs

At the law firm of Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC in Dayton, Ohio, we are dedicated to helping you and your family recover the compensation and benefits you need after suffering an injury or loss caused by another party's negligence.

Serving the Dayton metro region and all of Montgomery County and the surrounding areas, our team of experienced attorneys handle only personal injury, wrongful death and workers' compensation claims, and we will advocate strongly on your behalf in order to secure restitution for the damages you incurred.

Whether you were hurt in a motor vehicle accident, on the job, or as the result of medical malpractice, defective products, dangerous property conditions or some other act of negligence, you can trust the attorneys at our law firm to use their extensive knowledge and experience to help you obtain the justice you seek.

No Recovery, No Fee And Free Initial Consultations

We will not charge a fee from you unless we successfully recover compensation on your behalf. In addition, our law firm offers free initial consultations, so you can speak with one of our attorneys with no risk and no obligation.

For the quality, personalized assistance and support you and your family need during your difficult and uncertain time, you can contact Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC to schedule an appointment with a member of our legal team.
